content: peaceful easy blanket crochet pattern by susan kennedy of prettypeaceful http //www prettypeaceful etsy com http //www ravelry com/designers/susan-e-kennedy yarn any medium worsted weight yarn will work for this project the blanket pictured was made with a mix of lily sugar n cream cotton yarn and peaches & creme cotton yarn which are identical except in that peaches & creme is sold only at walmart stores the blanket requires 2 314 yards total 2 116 m 178 yards 163 m of each of the 13 colors you will need 2 balls of each color if you use sugar n cream or peaches & creme yarn finished blanket size 45 by 68 inches 115 x 173 cm with the recommended yarn and hook size the blanket is shown here on a full size double bed the colors marked in bold below are the actual colors used in the sample blanket color lily sugar n cream yellow or peaches & creme sunshine light yellow peaches & creme gold or lily sugar n cream goldenrod gold peaches & creme ocean coral or lily sugar n cream tangerine orange peaches & creme bright pink or lily sugar n cream hot pink dark pink peaches & creme pastel pink or lily sugar n cream rose pink light pink peaches & creme mint or lily sugar n cream beach glass light mint green lily sugar n cream seabreeze or peaches & creme seabreeze seafoam green lily sugar n cream mod blue turquoise lily sugar n cream hot blue or peaches & creme bright blue medium blue lily sugar n cream dazzle blue royal blue peaches & creme black currant or lily sugar n cream black currant purple peaches & creme fresh lilac or lily sugar n cream hot purple or light purple lily sugar n cream soft violet light lavender peaceful easy blanket crochet pattern yarn weight worsted weight hook size 6 mm us j size gauge 6 half_double_crochet stitches = 2 inches 5 cm 5 row in half_double_crochet = 2 inches 5 cm terms chain yarn over and pull through loop on hook half_double_crochet half_double_crochet stitch yarn over insert hook into stitch yarn over pull through stitch and all three loops on hook row 1 chain 135 half_double_crochet in 3rd loop from hook and all chains across turn 133 sts row 2-169 chain 2 counts as first half_double_crochet here and throughout half_double_crochet in each stitch across 133 sts in plain english the whole blanket is half_double_crochet stitches complete 13 row with each color start row 1 with light yellow yarn change to gold at the end of row 13 change to orange at the end of row 26 change to dark pink at the end of row 39 change to light pink at the end of row 52 change to light mint green at the end of row 65 change to seafoam green at the end of row 78 change to turquoise at the end of row 91 change to medium blue at the end
